extendedInfo.description: The creators of the chart-topping Stick CricketÂ®, the most popular cricket game in the world, bring you Super Sixes - a revolutionary new batting game! Instead of facing mere mortals, your opponent is the state-of-the-art Bowlomatic 3000: a sadistic bowling machine that is hell bent on wiping you out.Smash as many sixes as you can but be wary, as the Bowlomatic 3000 has plenty of tricks up his proverbial sleeve to ensure a harrowing time at the crease.The Bowlo doesnât get it all his own way, though. Alter tricky levels by unlocking the Super Bat, allowing you to slog sixes further than ever before, or rack up the points by switching to Golden Balls. Featuring endless gameplay, a raft of innovative challenges and detailed stats tracking, Super Sixes is the ultimate test of your cricket skills.***Pocket-lint âApp of the DayââThe gameplay is brilliant and, although using the same control setup as the original, it feels like an entirely different game.âAll Out CricketâThere are new innovations to build on the ingenious simplicity of the original. Two minutes swiftly becomes an hour.âBy downloading this app you are accepting our EULA: http://www.sticksports.com/mobile/terms.php

reviews.title: Quick addictive fun
reviews.comment: Not taxing and quick to play. Good fun in short bursts.

reviews.comment: fun as robots cool could have like country robots to make it more interesting but other than that awesome

reviews.comment: Its a really nice game. Get to enjoy the different levels trying to make more and more score. Really good game.

reviews.comment: This game is good and I think that it would b better if the overs were quicker

reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE
reviews.comment: This game is way better than the original but the orignal is unreal aswell. I love these two games. I would have given it more stars if I could. Fantastic stuff. Well done to the people who made. WOW !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Very good and easy to play. Loads of differant stages. Its awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Reallllly cool game. Loads of differant stages to play. Awesome! EPIC!!!

reviews.title: Simply Amazing
reviews.comment: By far the most enjoyable game I have played so far. Simple yet challenging in a strange way. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: Can be quite laggy + a big black box keeps appearing in the middle of my screen when I\'m playing (like an advert) and won\'t go away. Rather annoying! Apart from that, great game

reviews.title: good game  a must have game for cricket lovers
reviews.comment: In 60 seconds the game hangs and tye ball is not coming nicely to the bat tried uninstall and reinstall been t the same. please fix this issue but 5 stars given.

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: One of the simplest and best game. Lovely traffic jam and waiting time killer. Way to go.
reviews.author: Mayank Tyagi

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Its a brilliant game with many exotic levels. However ,the only flaw can be that there are not many levels to keep you busy. Otherwise, a superb and different game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice concepts!
reviews.comment: Oh man, these Stick Cricket guys never go short of ideas! This new game from them is simply awesome and very good fun to play. I play it all the time to and fro work. The concepts are good. I keep trying to beat personal bests :)
reviews.author: Praveen Kumar P S

reviews.title: The best stick ever
reviews.comment: Ausome fun game and much better than the original. Not tiring and quite addictive. Its one of the best games!!!

reviews.title: stick cricket tooo sticky n addictive.
reviews.comment: Good game to play n a nice stress buster. Gets difficult later but talent hitting  is wat is required.
